title: Indentation in Excel
text: Indentation in Excel is used to move the content of a cell to the right, making it easier to read and organize data.

title: Where to Find the Indent Button
text: The indent button is located in the Home tab, within the Alignment group.

hintAnswer: click the increase indent button (home tab|alignment group)
title: How to Indent a Cell
text: To indent a cell, you need to click a specific button in Excel. Which one is it?
choices: click the increase indent button (home tab
click the tab button on your keyboard
